2015.context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. Valued at $25.5B. Expanding globally despite regulatory battles with cities over housing impacts.

competitors.name: HomeAway/VRBO
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform focused on whole-home rentals, owned by Expedia

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: Online travel agency adding vacation rental inventory

competitors.name: Hotels
competitors.notes: Traditional hotel industry including Marriott, Hilton, Hyatt being disrupted

competitors.name: FlipKey (TripAdvisor)
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform owned by TripAdvisor

competitors.name: Couchsurfing
competitors.notes: Free home-sharing community for travelers

competitors.name: Wimdu
competitors.notes: European short-term rental competitor (later shut down)

competitors.name: 9flats
competitors.notes: German vacation rental platform

competitors.name: Tripping.com
competitors.notes: Vacation rental search aggregator

2020.context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. COVID-19 initially devastated bookings, then recovered with domestic travel and longer stays.

competitors.name: Vrbo (Expedia)
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform focused on family travel and whole homes

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: OTA with massive vacation rental inventory competing globally

competitors.name: Marriott Homes & Villas
competitors.notes: Hotel chain's premium home rental offering

competitors.name: Sonder
competitors.notes: Professionally managed apartment rentals

competitors.name: Vacasa
competitors.notes: Vacation rental management company with large inventory

competitors.name: Hotels
competitors.notes: Traditional hotels adapting with enhanced cleaning protocols

competitors.name: Hipcamp
competitors.notes: Camping and glamping accommodations platform

competitors.name: Getaway
competitors.notes: Cabin rental company for nature escapes

2024.context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. Post-pandemic travel boom. Expanded into experiences and long-term stays. Facing hotel industry pushback.

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: Largest OTA with growing vacation rental inventory

competitors.name: Vrbo (Expedia)
competitors.notes: Family-focused vacation rental platform

competitors.name: Marriott/Hilton
competitors.notes: Hotel chains with loyalty programs and home rental offerings

competitors.name: Sonder
competitors.notes: Tech-enabled hospitality with apartment-style accommodations

competitors.name: Vacasa
competitors.notes: Largest vacation rental management company

competitors.name: Hipcamp
competitors.notes: Outdoor accommodations marketplace

competitors.name: Homes & Villas by Marriott
competitors.notes: Premium home rentals from hotel giant

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Aggregating vacation rentals in search results

2025.context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. Mature marketplace with focus on quality and trust. Icons and unique experiences driving differentiation.

competitors.name: Booking Holdings
competitors.notes: Booking.com with massive global accommodation inventory

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Vrbo and Hotels.com competing across accommodations

competitors.name: Hotel Chains
competitors.notes: Marriott, Hilton expanding alternative accommodation offerings

competitors.name: Sonder
competitors.notes: Professionally managed urban apartments

competitors.name: Vacasa
competitors.notes: Vacation rental management with large US inventory

competitors.name: Hipcamp
competitors.notes: Outdoor and unique accommodations platform

competitors.name: Plum Guide
competitors.notes: Curated luxury home rentals

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Direct booking and aggregation threatening OTAs

mentionedBy.name: Booking Holdings, Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Alternative accommodations benefiting from preference for private stays
